Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory617.jpg'}
{3: 'The hills are covered in blooming flowers that sway gently in the breeze.'}
{3: "You never thought you'd see a sight like this during this era."}
{3: "You arrived at the rendezvous point with Selena's letter in your hand. You have been waiting for quite some time now but haven't seen her."}
{2: 'Wait', 3: '8', 4: 'Try to contact her.', 5: '9'}
{3: "You remember hearing the announcement about an assembly for a temporary mission on your way out this morning, and maybe that's where Selena is now."}
{3: "Before opening the communication software, you see the temporary mission notice on the terminal, with Selena's name on the list."}
{3: "Babylonia doesn't stop for one person. All rules apply even on a day that's special for someone."}
{3: 'Realizing this, you feel less anxious and walk alone into the flower field.'}
{3: 'The tranquil fragrance of the flowers lulls you to sleep and, slowly, your eyelids grow heavy...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oops, guess I dozed off just now.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'No, I should be the one apologizing. Sorry for making you wait for so long.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Shaking your head clear, you take Selena's hand and stand up. That's when it hits you that the sky is not as you remember it."}
{2: "Woah, seems like I've been here for quite some time already.", 3: '22'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Because the temporary mission was in the opposite direction of the conservation area, so... uh oh.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena lets out a suppressed "uh oh" as she lets go, presumably because it hit her that she didn\'t quite do so with the right force.'}
{3: "That's when you notice that she has a wreath of flowers and leaves around on her left arm, with vital fluid oozing out."}
{2: 'Are you hurt?', 3: '26'}
{3: 'Selena turns her body, hiding her injured arm.'}
{2: "You didn't rest after the mission?", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Well... I came straight to see you.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I was checking my terminal the entire time on my way back. I was kind of expecting you to send me a message telling me how mad you were for getting stood up and telling me that you were going to leave.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "And I started to panic because I never got any message from you. I thought you'd been waiting for me this entire time and that you'd be mad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'But then I got scared thinking that you might have just left without saying anything.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Selena's gaze appears a little evasive, and you can't be sure if it's because she's feeling guilty or embarrassed."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'And I just felt so glad... when I saw you sleeping among the flowers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "You were waiting for me, you accepted my invitation and did not leave, you didn't just give up on me. You were here all along...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'And all these negative thoughts I had in my head just went poof.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena places her hand over yours, interlocking your fingers with hers.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Please... keep me here, Conductor. Let me be a little selfish for just a little while longer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'The whole way back, I was thinking about asking you to dance with me on this special day.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Selena's gentle plea blends with the symphony of the wind and the flowers, like the accompaniment slowly being played out on a stage."}
{3: 'With it, your body moves subconsciously, guided by Selena.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor... Conductor...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the moment of your embrace, Selena closes her eyes and whispers by your ear, her breath warm against your skin.'}
{3: 'As we break away, she opens her eyes, and your heart skips a beat at her watery gaze. At that moment, you seem to understand what she was trying to say.'}
{3: '—Conductor, can you hear my soft call?'}
{3: '—Conductor... Conductor...'}
{3: '—Will you like how I sound?'}
{3: "Selena closes her eyes with a smile before you can answer her questions, seeming as though she's heard what you wanted to say."}
{3: 'The wind and flowers bind the two of you together. The two of you are in a chase after each other, your steps intertwining and figures entwined.'}
{3: 'The two of you dance well into the night, with the moonlight showering upon the two of you.'}
